...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST
MONDAY...

HAZARDOUS WEATHER...

 * TEMPERATURES WILL FALL INTO THE TEENS BY EVENING

 * LAKE EFFECT SNOW SHOWERS WILL LEAD TO ADDITIONAL ACCUMULATIONS
   OF 1 TO 3 INCHES THROUGH THE EVENING

 * NORTHWEST WINDS WILL INCREASE TODAY AND CREATE SOME BLOWING 
   AND DRIFTING SNOW. 

IMPACTS...

 * ROADS WILL BECOME ICY AND SNOW COVERED AS SNOW SHOWERS CONTINUE
   AND TEMPERATURES DROP INTO THE TEENS THROUGH THE DAY.

 * VISIBILITIES WILL BE REDUCED AT TIMES IN FALLING SNOW AND 
   BLOWING AND DRIFTING SNOW. 

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

 * THE MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION REMINDS MOTORISTS 
   TO ADJUST SPEEDS BASED ON THE CONDITIONS... AND TO TAKE IT 
   SLOW IN ICE AND SNOW. 

 * WEATHER PREPAREDNESS INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE ON LINE AT 
   WWW.READY.GOV/WINTER AND HTTP://GO.USA.GOV/5OG.
